subject: [Radiance-general] Projector format   2012 Radiance Workshop
body:
Message-ID: <2A1FD18147050B498AC9724AD18ADB3D377A0026@IU-MSSG-MBX104.ads.iu.edu>

Very late question and maybe no time to adjust, but what is the native resolution/ration of the room's projector?

I aam assembling in  4:3  1024x768
But could shift to 16:9  IF you happen to be on-line and that is viable.

-Rob
